enemyName: Bartholomew, Warden of the Haunted Mill
description: Bartholomew, the twisted and sinister caretaker of the Haunted Mill, stands before you, his eyes gleaming with malice. His weathered face is twisted into a cruel sneer, and his bony fingers grip a rusted axe that seems to radiate an aura of darkness.

attacks.attackDescription: Bartholomew swings his heavy axe with surprising speed, the ancient blade cutting through the air with a sickening thud.
Bartholomew unleashes a torrent of dark energy, the air crackling with a malevolent power that seems to sap the very life from your veins.
